name: Ratsa Zeneca
description:
You are a lab rat on a revenge mission. You have escaped your cage - now it is time for revenge. Contaminate the whole office building and build up your combo score!

Made for GameChangers GameJam 2020 (30h game jam).

Design: Johan Norr, Christoffer Schering, Aldo Sartori
3D: Isaac Olander, Malin Tuomas,  Ece Yünlü, Carl Andersson
Scripting: Johan Norr, Aldo Sartori
UX/UI: Johan Norr, Christoffer Scheing
